Uses of Interface
org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch.LineSearch

  • Packages that use LineSearch 
    Package Description
    org.platanios.learn.optimization  
    org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch  

    • Uses of LineSearch in org.platanios.learn.optimization

      Fields in org.platanios.learn.optimization declared as LineSearch 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) LineSearch AbstractLineSearchSolver.lineSearch
      Default value: If quadratic or linear function it is ExactLineSearch, otherwise it is StrongWolfeLineSearch with CONSERVE_FIRST_ORDER_CHANGE for the step size initialization method.
      protected LineSearch AbstractLineSearchSolver.AbstractBuilder.lineSearch 
      Methods in org.platanios.learn.optimization with parameters of type LineSearch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T AbstractLineSearchSolver.AbstractBuilder.lineSearch(LineSearch lineSearch) 

    • Uses of LineSearch in org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch

      Classes in org.platanios.learn.optimization.linesearch that implement LineSearch 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArmijoInterpolationLineSearch
      Implements an interpolation based line search algorithm that returns a step size value that satisfies the Armijo condition (also known as the sufficient decrease condition).
      class  BacktrackingLineSearch
      Implements a simple backtracking line search algorithm.
      class  ExactLineSearch
      Class implementing an exact line search algorithm.
      (package private) class  IterativeLineSearch
      Abstract class that all iterative line search algorithms should extend.
      class  StrongWolfeInterpolationLineSearch
      Implements an interpolation based line search algorithm that returns a step size value that satisfies the strong Wolfe conditions.
